HelpAddin.Name: Google Services
HelpAddin.Description: Provides essentials features like administration login, nickserv identification, etc..

CMD.Description: Performs a calculation of a math problem, or conversion of all sorts of units, like length, volume, time, temperature, currency, and more.
Looks up a definition in Google Dictionairy.
Looks up the weather forecast for the given location. (City/Zip Code)
Looks up a the current NASDAQ stock values of the company.
